name: swap_nodepool
purpose: Create a new nodepool, drain the old one so pods can be rescheduled on the new pool

name: recover_az
purpose: Rolls back the ELB(s) that were affected by the fail_az action

name: disassociate_vpc_from_zone
purpose: Remove an association between a VPC and a private hosted zone

name: count_cache_clusters_from_replication_group
purpose: Returns the number of cache clusters that are part of the given ReplicationGroupId

name: add_delay_fault
purpose: Add delay to the virtual service identified by name

name: start_machines
purpose: Start virtual machines at random

name: create_slow_connection_close_toxic
purpose: Limit the bandwith of a  downstream connection with a toxicity of 100%

name: delete_replication_groups
purpose: Deletes one or more replication groups and creates a final snapshot

name: fail_az
purpose: Simulates the loss of an AZ in an AWS Region for EC2

name: load_test_result_field_should_be_greater_than
purpose: Reads a load test result and compares the fieldâ€™s value to be greater than the expected given value.

name: get_stressor
purpose: Get a stressor

name: get_stressors
purpose: List all stressors

name: get_most_recent_docker_image
purpose: Get the most recent image information for a container.

name: restore_availability_zone_power_after_interruption
purpose: Undo the 'AZ Availability - Power Interruption' scenario

name: fixed_delay
purpose: Adds a fixed delay to a list of mappings

name: pods_in_conditions
purpose: Lookup a pod by label_selector in the namespace ns.

name: service_is_deploying
purpose: Checks to make sure there is not an in-progress deployment

name: get_proxy_attribute
purpose: Returns an attribute of a specified proxy

name: start_stress_pod_delete_scenario
purpose: Run the 'EKS Stress - Pod Delete' scenario

parameters.title: Description
parameters.default: Delete one or more EKS pods

name: stop_chaos
purpose: Stop Chaos in your cluster

name: service_is_initialized
purpose: Check if a service is initialized

parameters.title: Fail Action if Service Not Initialized

name: chaos_report
purpose: Get Chaos report using the Service Fabric API

name: deployment_is_fully_available
purpose: Wait until all the deployment expected replicas are available

name: down
purpose: Set a list of services down

name: valid_slo_ratio_during_window
purpose: Verifies that SLO is matching expectation over a period of time

name: send_command
purpose: Runs commands on one or more managed instances

name: deny_all_egress
purpose: Deny all egress from pods

name: list_cluster_group_instances
purpose: Get a list of instance group instances associated to the EMR cluster

name: has_incident_been_resolved
purpose: Has any incident been resolved?
